text:
In the FAQ, there's a link to what's supposed to be a page about an ant task to run JMeter with. This link is broken.

Link to FAQ question: http://wiki.apache.org/jmeter/JMeterFAQ#How_to_run_JMeter_test_plan_programatically.2C_such_as_from_an_Ant_script.3F

Broken link: http://www.programmerplanet.org/ant-jmeter/

New link should probably be: http://www.programmerplanet.org/projects/jmeter-ant-task/
creator: stefanhetzwaantje@gmail.com
